Package controller

Class CentralController

  • java.lang.Object
    • controller.CentralController
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AdminController, AlbumController, InputController, LoginController, PhotoController

    public class CentralController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is the central part that makes changing scenes and stages easier. It also contains the serialize and de-serialize functions from where the application opens and closes attaining or saving data respectively.
    Version:
    1
    Author:
    Brenda Michelle, Roy Jacome

      This is a method called from LoginController.

    • Method Detail

      • start

        public void start​(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception

      • closeFromDifferentStage

        public static void closeFromDifferentStage​()
                                    throws java.io.IOException
        This is a method that can be used to close the application from another stage. It makes sure to save the data by calling the serialize() method.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the serialization was not successful

      • saveFile

        public static void saveFile​()
        This method is called from central controller when the primary stage is being forced to close. It also calls serialize().

      • serialize

        public static void serialize​(UserHelper userModel)
                      throws java.io.IOException
        This method is used to save all the information of the program by serializing the data into a .dat file.
        Parameters:
        userModel - the model of the user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if data cannot be serialized.

      • deserialize

        public static UserHelper deserialize​(UserHelper userModel)
                              throws java.io.IOException,
                                     java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        This method is used to retrieve the data by de-serializing the .dat file containing the program data. If there is no data to be retrieved, which will occur the first time around, the method adds a user named "Stock" and fills an album containing some stock photos.
        Parameters:
        userModel - the model of the user
        Returns:
        userModel which is the model of the user
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if the desrialization is not possible
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if the class is not found

      • getNewPhotoFile

        public static java.io.File getNewPhotoFile​()
        This method gets the file of a photo.
        Returns:
        File

      • switchToAdmin

        public static void switchToAdmin​()
        This method is called from the login LoginController. It is called when the admin wishes to login.

      • logoutFromAdmin

        public static void logoutFromAdmin​()
        This method is called when the admin wishes to logout.

      • fromLogin2Album

        public static void fromLogin2Album​()
        This is a method called from LoginController. It takes us to the stage and scene that displays albums.

      • lastPhotoCopied

        public static void lastPhotoCopied​()
        This method hides the photo stage.

      • fromAlbum2PhotoView

        public static void fromAlbum2PhotoView​()
        This is a method called from LoginController. It takes us to the scene that displays the photo slide show view.

      • fromAlbum2Login

        public static void fromAlbum2Login​()
        This is a method called from LoginController. It takes us to initial login scene.
